name: api_input_Touch
description: Structure describing the status of a finger touching the screen.

properties.name: altitudeAngle
properties.description: Value of 0 radians indicates that the stylus is parallel to the surface, pi/2 indicates that it is perpendicular.

properties.name: azimuthAngle
properties.description: Value of 0 radians indicates that the stylus is pointed along the x-axis of the device.

properties.name: deltaPosition
properties.description: The position delta since last change in pixel coordinates.

properties.name: deltaTime
properties.description: Amount of time that has passed since the last recorded change in Touch values.

properties.name: fingerId
properties.description: The unique index for the touch.

properties.name: maximumPossiblePressure
properties.description: The maximum possible pressure value for a platform. If Input.touchPressureSupported returns false, the value of this property will always be 1.0f.

properties.name: phase
properties.description: Describes the phase of the touch.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of the touch in screen space pixel coordinates.

properties.name: pressure
properties.description: The current amount of pressure being applied to a touch. 1.0f is considered to be the pressure of an average touch. If Input.touchPressureSupported returns false, the value of this property will always be 1.0f.

properties.name: radius
properties.description: An estimated value of the radius of a touch. Add radiusVariance to get the maximum touch size, subtract it to get the minimum touch size.

properties.name: radiusVariance
properties.description: This value determines the accuracy of the touch radius. Add this value to the radius to get the maximum touch size, subtract it to get the minimum touch size.

properties.name: rawPosition
properties.description: The first position of the touch contact in screen space pixel coordinates.

properties.name: type
properties.description: A value that indicates whether a touch was of Direct, Indirect (or remote), or Stylus type.
